description.value:
You’ve modified the ends of your LFAN to tighten their grip.

Prerequisites: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.pBDeKG9AUxoDn8mo]{Pincered LFAN}

Benefit: You gain a +2 species bonus to your KAC against disarm combat maneuvers. You can use your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.oqsObKnxzFKUOb5u]{LFAN} to grapple other creatures. When you score a critical hit with your LFAN natural weapon, you can also automatically grapple the target if your attack roll equals or exceeds the target’s KAC +4 (pinning them instead if your attack roll equals or exceeds the target’s KAC +13).

Enable/disable modifiers in the Modifiers tab.

modifiers.name: Grasping LFAN
modifiers.notes: You gain a +2 species bonus to your KAC against disarm combat maneuvers.
